title: Demand for COVID antibody drugs soars in hard-hit states
author: KELLI KENNEDY; MATTHEW PERRONE Associated Press
description: People infected with COVID-19 were captured in a photo this week lying on the floor in pain while waiting for antibody infusions at a treatment site set up inside the library in Jacksonville, Florida. The image has become a vivid illustration of the huge demand for the once-neglected COVID-19 drugs in the states hit hardest by a summer surge of infections being driven by the highly contagious delta variant. "They were moaning and obviously in a lot of pain.
